about_the_game:
About

This is an add-on for The Tenth Line that includes a book of artwork and the digital soundtrack to the game.

The art book is in 120dpi PDF format, and includes artwork of all characters and locations in the game, including never-before-seen concept sketches and designs, and developer/artist notes on their production! The total length is 68 pages.

The soundtrack contains 29 high-quality tracks of the game's music composed by Alan Monteiro, along with track titles and metadata for easy import into your favorite music device or service. This includes three tracks unique to the Special Edition of the game.

Extended Soundtrack Track Listing

  • "The Tenth Line" (2:43)
  • "Pangs" (3:36)
  • "Make a Mark" (3:33)
  • "The Feeling Fades" (0:50)
  • "A Churning in the Distance" (2:42)
  • "Deeds by Candlelight" (2:54)
  • "A Friend As Real As I" (3:18)
  • "Quad Pro Quo" (3:06)
  • "A Moment To Shine" (3:33)
  • "Tales Told by Torchlight" (2:35)
  • "Never So Simple" (3:24)
  • "Green and Grey" (2:42)
  • "Green and Gold" (2:40)
  • "Shelter from Wind and Rain" (4:52)
  • "Warrior's Glen" (2:31)
  • "Above All Else" (2:32)
  • "A Sky Made of Tar" (2:38)
  • "How It Once Was" (2:52)
  • "Those Who Stepped Lightly" (2:43)
  • "Dance of Earth and Sky" (2:57)
  • "Fractured and Swept Away" (2:38)
  • "In Spite of All Else" (3:46)
  • "That Which Tales Are Written Of" (2:50)
  • "Taper's End" (2:56)
  • "One Over Infinity" (3:56)
  • "The Tenth Line (Reprise)" (3:33)
  • "Unforeseen Adversaries" (4:32)
  • "Where There Are Still Fragments" (4:03)
  • "The Ninth Line" (3:39)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 362 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Music is in FLAC format; Book is in PDF format
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 362 MB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Music is in FLAC format; Book is in PDF format

name: The Tenth Line - Digital Art Book + Soundtrack

Minimum:
  • Storage: 307 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 625 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Storage: 362 MB available space

short_description: Contains a book of high-quality artwork and concept images for the game's locations and characters (PDF format), and a full high-quality soundtrack (29 tracks).
